WelcomeMsg: Hi, you've reached a counsellor. What would you like to talk about?
GoodbyeMsg: Thank you for using our Live Chat counselling service. As part of our ongoing efforts to improve our service and better understand how to help and support you we would like to ask for your feedback by completing an optional feedback survey. The first page of the survey explains how this data is used. This survey will only take 5 minutes of your time: https://survey.alchemer-ca.com/s3/50188874/Post-Chat-Survey
EndChatMsg: Thank you for using our Live Chat counselling service. As part of our ongoing efforts to improve our service and better understand how to help and support you we would like to ask for your feedback by completing an optional feedback survey. ClosedOutOfShift:
We're sorry, but Live Chat is currently closed. :( 
To reach a Kids Help Phone counsellor, call us anytime at 1-800-668-6868. 
Be well, 
The Kids Help Phone Team
